errors.error_description: Installation commands are in wrong logical order - installing specific scanpy version after scvelo could cause dependency conflicts
correction_candidates: Install scanpy first, then scvelo: conda install scanpy==1.7.0 followed by pip install scvelo
Use a single command: pip install scvelo scanpy==1.7.0
Create virtual environment first, then install dependencies in correct order
Install both packages simultaneously: conda install scvelo scanpy==1.7.0
errors.golden_answer: Install scanpy first, then scvelo: conda install scanpy==1.7.0 followed by pip install scvelo
